description: Enjoy a leisurely paddle boating session on the Werse River, perfect for cooling off on a hot day.

locationInfo.description: A relaxing paddle boating experience on the Werse River, surrounded by lush greenery.

description: A fun and energetic game of beach volleyball at Münster's popular Hafenplatz.
groupSuitability: Best for two people looking for an active outdoor game

locationInfo.description: A vibrant outdoor volleyball court near Münster's harbor area, offering a great summer sports experience.
safetyTips: Wear sunglasses to protect your eyes from the sun.
Use sand-friendly footwear to avoid burns.

description: Explore the beautiful landscape of Sentruper Höhe on a tandem bike, a perfect activity for two.

locationInfo.description: A scenic cycling path through green spaces and quiet lanes of Sentruper Höhe.
safetyTips: Adjust the tandem bike for comfort.
Carry a water bottle to stay hydrated.

activity: Outdoor Photography Walk at Botanischer Garten
description: Capture the beauty of Münster's botanical garden with an outdoor photography walk.
groupSuitability: Perfect for two people with an interest in photography

locationInfo.description: A lush botanical garden with diverse plant species, offering great photography opportunities.
safetyTips: Use a UV filter to protect your camera lens.
Avoid midday sun for better lighting conditions.

description: Challenge your partner to a strategic game of chess at Münster's outdoor chess tables.

locationInfo.description: A quiet spot in Promenade Park featuring large outdoor chess tables shaded by trees.
safetyTips: Find a shaded spot to avoid direct sunlight.
Bring a bottle of water to stay hydrated.
Use insect repellent if playing in the late afternoon.
